@!@ rolesdict = {"domaincontroller_master":"Domänencontroller Master","domaincontroller_backup":"Domänencontroller Backup","domaincontroller_slave":"Domänencontroller Slave","memberserver":"Memberserver","managed_client":"Managed Client","mobile_client":"Mobile Client"} role = rolesdict["@%@server/role@%@"] print "

Willkommen auf dem", role , "@%@hostname@%@

" print' ' print' ' if not role == "Domänencontroller Master" : print' ' print' ' print' ' print' ' print' ' print' ' print' ' @!@
